title: Intense Love - Novel Updates
tags: Acting   Adapted to Drama   Adapted to Drama CD   Arranged Marriage   Beautiful Female Lead   Carefree Protagonist   Charismatic Protagonist   Childhood Promise   Clever Protagonist   Cold Love Interests   Couple Growth   Cousins   Cute Story   Doctors   Doting Love Interests   Engagement   Female Protagonist   First Love   First-time Interc**rse   Handsome Male Lead   Modern Day   Power Couple   Pregnancy   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Showbiz   Slow Romance   Smart Couple   Twins   Wealthy Characters   Younger Brothers   Younger Sisters
author: Liu Mang Xing   六盲星
description:
Su Jinbei’s life motto used to be high heels and fresh meat (pretty boys) above all else.

Then she met Zhou Shiyun.

Her life motto was quickly changed to:

High heels are indeed too expensive, fresh meat has become more expensive.

Both can be thrown aside for Treasure Zhou.>
